resources.string: Reports and Sustainings\n\nWhen on, Reports and Sustainings will be excluded.
History\n\nWhen on, talks that have been read will be excluded
Read in App\n\nWhen on, Talks will be opened in the App as opposed to Gospel Library or a Browser

How to Use:\nTo Generate a Completely Random Talk leave all fields blank and click the bottom left button. To go to the selected Talk click the bottom right button. Fill in the fields to filter selectable talk.
Questions, Comments, or Concerns? Please Email\nvailthor1@gmail.com
